Dhrubotara is a non-political, non-communal, non-profitable, volunteer organization. The unity of its members & whole hearten support of people is the driving power of this organization. It was started from 3rd November,2000 as a cultural & child organization. DSSS was re-organized with strong organizational structure in 2009.It maintains a participatory culture in its process of planning, decision-making & implementation. It works for social, economical development of Bangladesh. Its works with youth group, children, teen-age, adolescent & different community groups. Social development & fulfill the goal of organization is its vision. 

It is registered under the (1961's Volunteer Organizations Act) Social Welfare Ministry and the Youth & Sports Ministry of the people republic of Bangladesh. We received many awards for our creative works. Dhrubotara means polestar- we working last 14 years in Bangladesh, with honesty and goodwill. We are always work for humanity. We also work on climate change- environment issues, peace building and anti violence issues, women empowerment, youth development, cultural development, entrepreneurship & leadership, health and education issue. We already work on human rights - good governance, rights based work in our working areas. Poor, landless, mass people of rural level are beneficiary. We need fund & support. 

Our working areas: 

Noakhali, Laxmipur, Feni, Dhaka,Chittagong, Comilla, Chadpur,Gopalganj, Munsigonj, Bhola & Barisal, Rajshahi , Potuakhali. 

Future working area : 

All over Bangladesh (We are continue working on it)
